flawed_nl_solution:
The second stack has 7 blocks + 3 blocks = <<7+3=10>>10 blocks.
The third stack has 10 blocks - 6 blocks = <<10-6=4>>4 blocks.
The fourth stack has 4 blocks + 10 blocks = <<4+10=41>>41 blocks.
The fifth stack has 10 blocks x 2 = <<10*2=20>>20 blocks.
In total there are 7 blocks + 10 blocks + 4 blocks + 41 blocks + 20 blocks = <<7+10+4+41+20=82>>82 blocks.
#### 82

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
